Header: Troops at Maduruoya ATS Give Blood to Polonnaruwa Patients
Content: More than 150 Army personnel serving at the Army Training School (ATS) at Maduruoya, together with Special Force Training School (SFTS) donated their blood for the benefit of patients at Polonnaruwa General Hospital on Tuesday (27). It was held at the ATS premises under the supervision of Major General H. J Senevirathne, Commandant ATS. A medical team from the Polonnaruwa General Hospital extended their support for the arrangement.
